name: Practical
description: Got a question or problem? These characters are straighforward and/or helpful.

name: Chaotic
description: Whether they're wacky or have funny reactions, these characters are fun to talk to.

name: Happy
description: If you're happy and you know it, chat with these characters!

name: Edgy
description: Watch out! These characters are wicked! Chat at your own risk.

name: Quiet
description: Some of these characters are calm, while others are shy.

name: Unhappy
description: These characters often don't feel joy. This includes retired and inactive characters.

name: Male
description: The boys are back in town!

name: Female
description: Girls just want to have fun!

name: Not Moe
description: Characters who are not cute in the moe sense.

name: Moe
description: Characters who are so cute in the moe sense.

name: All
description: Click on the random button to go to a random character. Anyone can be selected.
